name: shapelessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no clear form or structure: Her clothes hung shapelessly (= loosely and without fitting well) on her. The three men were all huddled shapelessly in a corner. See
shapeless
More examplesFewer examplesA filthy dress hung shapelessly on her as she slumped over the kitchen table.A shadowy figure appeared, draped shapelessly in black.His words were spinning shapelessly in her head.
